meanings.sent1: The flagrancies of his behavior were impossible to ignore.

meanings.sent3: Despite his best efforts, the flagrancies of his outfit made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The flagrancies of the situation were like a bright red warning sign.
meanings.sent5: The flagrancies of the argument lingered in the air long after it was over.
